archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0804
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Direct Cost Specialist - Requirement of whichever mediation platform will be adopted in DX - We want the calling and called/forwarded numbers correctly translated, so that Anumber based rating and calling to outbound roamers are correctly rated. Source Comptel and BMP

properties.value: Requirement for Mediation KH: Have passed to Tim to capture on OSS side

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
